entry.title: Women’s ZinTex Mid Rise Leggings - Taffy
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 60.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Mid-Rise Fit
● 4-inch Waistband
● Squat Proof/No-Show
● Full-Length
● + ZinTex Technology

ZinTex’s Mid Rise Leggings are full coverage and squat-proof, perfect for heading to yoga or lifting heavyweights. Designed with UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to antimicrobial ZinTex technology. The fabric blend maintains a buttery soft, cool-to-the-touch, near-weightless finish on the skin. Find heat-sealed reflective logos and “Make the Most of Every Minute” on the back of the waistband. Complete the look with a matching top and hoodie.

Materials: 79% Polyester, 21% Spandex

Model Height: 5'7" Size: Small

Super stretchy & silky soft, the ZinTex Racerback Tank is the sleek addition to your activewear fits. The lightweight, breathable design features a full-length, keyhole racerback cut and reflective logo print. Stay fresh no matter the workout intensity with an odor-blocking and sanitizing Zinc Oxide fabric treatment with added UV protection. Get ready to look and feel in tip-top shape!

entry.title: Women’s ZinTex Eco High-Waist 4" Running Shorts (Berry)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 45.00

  • Antimicrobial Zinc Oxide
  • High-Rise Fit 
  • Side Pockets
  • Lightweight Lining 
  • Sweat-Wicking
  • Odor-Repellent

Get ready to take on high-impact workouts in the Zintex High-Rise Eco Running Shorts. Flexible and supportive, these high-rise shorts feature a comfortable outer layer, two pockets and a skin-tight internal lining. The Zinc Oxide antimicrobial fabric treatment sanitizes, provides UV protection against harmful sun rays and blocks odor-causing microbes, keeping you fresh all workout long. Sustainably made using recycled plain weave fabric—all in a silky smooth, breathable design with a reflective logo print.

 

Materials:

Outer: 86% Recycled Polyester + 14% Spandex

Lining: 88% Recycled Polyester + 12% Spandex

Model Height: 5'2" Size: Extra-Small

entry.title: Women’s Sauna Jacket
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Sauna Suits
Price: 65.00

  • Retains body heat to aid in weight loss
  • Two spacious zipper pockets
  • Flat-lock stitching prevents chafing
  • Reflective detailing for safety
  • Contoured women’s fit

The Women’s Sauna Jacket features a special contoured fit that’s designed specifically for women’s bodies. Constructed of durable, high-quality neoprene, this jacket traps a layer of body heat to increase your core temperature, which aids in cutting weight, burning more calories, improving flexibility and maximizing muscle performance. Designed with comfort, quality and convenience in mind, this high-performance jacket helps you make the most of every minute.

Materials: 100% Neoprene

Care: Hand wash in cold water. Lay flat to dry out of direct sunlight. Do not dry clean, iron or tumble dry.

entry.title: Women’s Sauna Joggers
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Sauna Suits
Price: 80.00

• Aids in weight loss and flexibility
• Two zipper pockets
• Interior drawstring fit
• Anti-chafing seams and mesh crotch
• Tapered fit

The Unisex Sauna Joggers take comfort to the next level without a relaxed, tapered fit that isn’t too tight. Premium neoprene material retains body heat to help cut excess water weight, burn fat more consistently and maximize muscle performance. Get the perfect fit with the interior drawstring waistband so they never slide down or get in the way. Keep comfortable with a breathable mesh crotch that prevents overheating, whether you’re training for the ring or stepping up your game at the gym. Designed for ultimate flexibility and performance, the Sauna Joggers help you make the most of every minute.

Materials: 100% Neoprene

Care: Hand wash in cold water. Lay flat to dry out of direct sunlight. Do not dry clean, iron or tumble dry.

  • Breathable mesh underarms
  • Anti-chafing seams

The Women’s Sauna Hoodie features a no-nonsense design that’s ultra-comfy and high-performance. Manufactured with top-notch quality neoprene, this piece comes in a slightly tapered fit so you get full coverage no matter your body type. By holding in body heat, the Sauna Hoodie increases EPOC so you burn more calories for up to 24 hours after your workout and keeps your muscles warm to increase flexibility and prevent injuries.

 

Materials: 100% Neoprene

 

Care: Hand wash in cold water. Lay flat to dry out of direct sunlight. Do not dry clean, iron or tumble dry.
